mapper.select: SELECT alt_apr_id, alt_apr_start_date, alt_apr_end_date, alt_apr_content, alt_apr_state, emp_id, alt_apr_emp FROM ALTERNATE_APPROVER WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND alt_apr_emp = #{altAprEmp} AND alt_apr_state = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE ALTERNATE_APPROVER SET alt_apr_state = 0 WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND alt_apr_emp = #{altAprEmp} AND alt_apr_start_date < sysdate AND alt_apr_end_date > sysdate
